item.title: How to Add a Webphone Button in your Website
item.description: Photo Source: Interactive Powers, Pexels. Creative Commons In this post we will show you how to add a Webphone button in your website using our customizable webcall widget. Step one: Installation To install the Webphone Button in your webÂ­page you need to download our webcall widget webcall_widget_noflash.zip and uncompress it in the directory of your website. To insert it, you first need to add the CSS Stylesheet file to your webpage.
